files-maven-plugin

files-maven-plugin
Project Documentation
  • Project Information
  • Project Reports

files:copy

Full name:

com.github.ltennstedt:files-maven-plugin:3-SNAPSHOT:copy

Description:

Mojo for copying files and directories

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Since version: 1.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
<file> File 1 Source file or directory
<into> File 1 Target directory

Parameter Details

<file>

Source file or directory
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1
  • Required: Yes

<into>

Target directory
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Since: 1
  • Required: Yes
